Wealthy Men of Bible Times 

     This Ethiopian was a man of good standing and of wide influence. God saw that when converted, he would give others the light he had received, and would exert a strong influence in favor of the gospel. Angels of God were attending this seeker for light, and he was being drawn to the Saviour. By the ministration of the Holy Spirit, the Lord 
                                                                           205
brought him into touch with one who could lead him to the light.--The Acts of the Apostles, p. 107.
